EmailTemplate.name: 19-0227 CSAP Payment Email
EmailTemplate.subject: You're approved for community solar! What's next?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Congratulations! You have been approved for the {!Opportunity.Shared_Solar_System__c} solar farm. Only two more steps to complete your enrollment:
First, enter your preferred payment method in our secure portal.
Enter Payment Information: {!Lead.Continue_Application_Link__c}
Then, check your email. Once we've verified your payment details, we'll email a link to your subscription agreement, which you can review and sign using DocuSign. That's it!
Thanks for joining the wave, we're happy you're here.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Sales Support 844.786.4100 | learnmore@bluewavesolar.com
